name: Suicune ex
author: Ryo Ueda

attacks.name: Energy Flip
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. You may move an Energy card attached to that Pokémon to another of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Reverse Stream
attacks.effect: You may return all basic Energy cards attached to Suicune ex to your hand. If you do, this attack does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each basic Energy card you returned.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
